query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS quality_images (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  image_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  image_key VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  image_type ENUM('before', 'after', 'reference', 'defect', 'camera_capture') DEFAULT 'before' NOT NULL,
  product_code VARCHAR(100),
  production_line_id INT,
  workstation_id INT,
  batch_number VARCHAR(100),
  capture_source ENUM('upload', 'camera', 'api') DEFAULT 'upload' NOT NULL,
  ai_analysis JSON,
  quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  defects_found INT DEFAULT 0,
  severity ENUM('none', 'minor', 'major', 'critical') DEFAULT 'none',
  notes TEXT,
  metadata JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_quality_images_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_quality_images_product (product_code),
  INDEX idx_quality_images_line (production_line_id),
  INDEX idx_quality_images_type (image_type),
  INDEX idx_quality_images_created (created_at)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS quality_images (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  image_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  image_key VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  image_type ENUM('before', 'after', 'reference', 'defect', 'camera_capture') DEFAULT 'before' NOT NULL,
  product_code VARCHAR(100),
  production_line_id INT,
  workstation_id INT,
  batch_number VARCHAR(100),
  capture_source ENUM('upload', 'camera', 'api') DEFAULT 'upload' NOT NULL,
  ai_analysis JSON,
  quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  defects_found INT DEFAULT 0,
  severity ENUM('none', 'minor', 'major', 'critical') DEFAULT 'none',
  notes TEXT,
  metadata JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_quality_images_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_quality_images_product (product_code),
  INDEX idx_quality_images_line (production_line_id),
  INDEX idx_quality_images_type (image_type),
  INDEX idx_quality_images_created (created_at)
)
